## Bug Fixes Applied

1. **Settings Attribute Case** - Fixed `settings.ANTHROPIC_API_KEY` → `settings.anthropic_api_key`
2. **Settings Attribute Case** - Fixed `settings.CLAUDE_MODEL` → `settings.claude_model`
3. **Module Imports** - Fixed ai_agents.py imports to use actual class names

## Module Architecture

```

processor/
├── **init**.py         # Exports 70+ classes/functions
├── config.py           # Settings with GCP Secret Manager
├── ai_agents.py        # 5 autonomous agents + orchestrator
├── analytics_pipeline.py # Kafka + Prometheus + Grafana
├── media_manager.py    # CDN & asset management
├── oauth_manager.py    # Multi-platform OAuth 2.0
├── predictive_engine.py # ML predictions
├── publishing_orchestrator.py # Cross-platform publishing
├── trend_sources.py    # Trend aggregation
└── video_factory.py    # AI video production

```bash
